name: 𝐌𝐨𝐲𝐚
description:
- Description -

Embodied as a moth, you must traverse the mist of the forest, evade hungry creatures of the deep and fly to reach moonlight from level to level. On your journey you will encounter strange critters, developing the truth in the forest and reflecting upon the circle of life.

Moya (Japanese for mist) is a short, 2D adventure game with an emphasis on the narrative of the player’s journey.

- Features -

  • retro vertically scrolling mechanics
  • collectable upgrades
  • diverse enemies
  • compelling soundtrack
  • meaningful dialogue
  • purposeful story

- Controls -

Arrowkeys control the player

  • ←↑↓→

Mouse controls the menu selection

  • ➤

- Contact -

  • efield910@gmail.com

- Download Instructions -

  • Download the zip file, extract all and then run the .exe file.
  • On Windows 10, a "Windows protected your PC" message may pop up. If so, just click "More info" and "Run anyway".
